## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8c7fd443fcaba7627f28aa45f16610fef8703f54b0f2dad9c22642c2d428a278)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'remark-cross-site-link-plugin' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
